body.name: From Korean Toner, Rice Toner for Face Korean Skin Care, 77.78% Rice Extract from Korea, K Beauty Toner, Glow Essence with Niacinamide, Hydrating for All Skin Types, Vegan, Alcohol and Fragrance Free.

features: Packed with 77.78% goami rice extracts, this hydrating korean rice toner provides anti-wrinkle and brightening care while delivering moisturizing benefits. Other key ingredients include rice bran extract, amaranthus caudatus seed extract and portulaca oleracea extract, which provide nourishing and soothing flaky dead skin cells by forming a moisture protective layer. Formula treats skin concerns such as dry or fatigued skin as well as aging skin with fine lines.

Goami extract delivers intense moisture to skin and brightens the complexion.Goami is a type of rice that is rich in essential amino acids,which contains more hemicellulose than other rice and to improve skin health.Goami rice is an excellent ingredient for promoting smooth and twice as much dietary fiber as other rice to remove skin impurities for clear skin.

Goami extract regulates skin’s oil-water levels and prevents moisture loss to keep skin hydrated all day long.It improves hydration & moisture barrier with illuminating effect. It also improves the oil and water balance of your skin.
How to Use:Shake the rice toner well to mix the ingredients before use.Evenly spread a proper amount onto face.Gently pat skin for further absorption.

Suitable for various skin types:Hypoallergenic toner is suitable for sensitive skin,Organic goami extract is gentle on skin, and suitable for sensitive skin prone to irritation.The k beauty rice toner refreshes tired and rough skin to make it bright,supple and baby-soft.
Safe to use:Clinically tested for skin irritation/Contains non-GMO raw ingredients toner is safe to use.Vegan, Alcohol and Fragrance Free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Descriptions: Packed with 77.78% goami rice extracts, this hydrating toner provides anti-wrinkle and brightening care while delivering moisturizing benefits. Other key ingredients include rice bran extract, amaranthus caudatus seed extract and portulaca oleracea extract, which provide nourishing and soothing effects. Formula treats skin concerns such as dry or fatigued skin as well as aging skin with fine lines. Suitable for various skin types including sensitive skin. Major Ingredients: Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract (77.78%), Methylpropanediol, Triethylhexanoin, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Water, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Butylene Glycol, Adenosine, Cellulose Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol. Benefits: Infused with 77.78% goami extract, this rice toner revitalizes dull-looking skin and delivers intense moisture, while brightening the complexion. Contains niacinamide to further boost skin's radiance. Toner leaves skin soft and supple with a refreshing finish. How to Use: Shake well before use. Evenly spread a proper amount onto face. Gently pat skin for further absorption. Size : 150ml

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rice water toner
reviews.reviewText: I had 0 expectations while trying this product, but let me tell you! I absolutely love this product. It left my face so freaking smooth and it did not break me out. I have dry, acne prone skin and a lot of toners do not work with my sensitive skin. But this product works wonders! I always wake up with a baby smooth face but not oily! I even put this on my arms! I always forget to put lotion on at night, but I put the rice water toner on my arms instead. So far, it feels like I’ve never forgot my lotion in the first place. Now imagine the double whammy. It does have a small natural smell of rice but that’s a good thing…. It’s actually made with rice… the fragrance is natural so it won’t hurt the face or anything. I highly recommend using this! Love it so much! Now remember, little goes a long way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Effective
reviews.reviewText: Have only been using Korean skin care for a short time and this toner does not disappoint,very lovely. My mature skin has started to show a nice soft glow. I gave the scent 4 stars. I usually prefer fragrance free products but this one is very subtle. Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I adore this toner! I took a risk buying a rice toner I had not heard much about because I wanted to try one of these rice toners ! I chose not to buy the super expensive hyped up one…..I’m so glad I did! This feels amazing on my skin….very hydrating and plumping…similar to an hyaluronic acid serum but more creamy if that makes sense. Works well alone under makeup. And I personally absolutely love the smell! I would definitely repurchase and recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. This was my first time trying a rice toner and it's soothing to my skin. Excellent for sensitive or dry skin, non-drying. I use this AM and PM. I'm always on the lookout for new beauty products to add to my skincare routine, and this was a lucky find. I read the reviews on Amazon and quickly ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non-drying/cleans out my pours
reviews.reviewText: I like how well this toner cleans out the pours around my nose! My skin is on the drier side, but after using the rice toner it feels smooth and soft, not dry. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product makes your skin so soft
reviews.reviewText: I’m really surprised by this product. I was using a very strong toner because i had dark spots on my skin but it makes my skin really dry so i had to put alot of cream and serum on my face. I started looking for a toner that is gentle for my skin and i saw this product. I’ve heard about how rice and korean products are actually good so i bought this just to try it out. But i was so amazed on after just 1 week of just using this, it made my skin glow! My face is so smooth and soft, i can’t stop touching it lol. I only use a little amount of cream or serum on my face now which is a relief because i hate it when i have too much chemicals on my face. Would definitely buy this again and again and again. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm fairly new to.skin care and already have tried a few different toners and this just might be my favorite! This is also the only rice toner I've tried amongst them all. I definitely will buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toner I’ve used by far!!
reviews.reviewText: When looking for toners I wanted one that would help absorb my moisturizer well to help eith my dry flaky skin. All the other toners i have used never did what I wanted until i bought the this one! Some of you guys know that korean use rice water (yes literally) as toners for their face. Since i do not make rice everyday, it is hard for me to do this. This product is an substitution and I love it.
